text: Blue Lightning may refer to: *The Blue Lightning, a 1986 Australian film *Blue Lightning (1989 video game), an Atari video game for the Lynx console *Blue Lightning (1995 video game), an Atari video game for the Jaguar console *IBM 486DLC (Blue Lightning), an improved version of the IBM 386SLC *Blue Lightning (album), a 2016 album by Evan K
title: Blue Lightning
